questions.question: What is the main advantage of electric motors over combustion engines?
options: They are always cheaper to manufacture
They provide instant torque and are more efficient

questions.question: What does motor efficiency mean?
options: How much electrical energy is converted to mechanical energy

questions.question: What is torque in an electric motor?
options: The maximum speed of the vehicle
The rotational force that causes acceleration

questions.question: Why do electric motors require less maintenance than combustion engines?
options: They are made of stronger materials
